meanings.definition: The greatest or highest possible amount or degree.
meanings.sent1: She reached the maximins of her happiness when she got her dream job.
meanings.sent2: The mountain climber aimed to conquer the maximins of the peak.
meanings.sent3: The cake was piled high with the maximins of colorful frosting.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to his craft reached the maximins of perfection.
meanings.sent5: The marathon runner pushed herself to the maximins of her endurance.

meanings.definition: The smallest or lowest possible amount or degree.
meanings.sent1: He only had the maximins of energy left after a long day at work.
meanings.sent2: The pond was so shallow that it only reached the maximins of his ankles.
meanings.sent3: The tiny plant struggled to survive with the maximins of sunlight it received.
meanings.sent4: Her voice was barely a whisper, at the maximins of volume.
meanings.sent5: The ant carried the maximins of food back to its nest.
